# Support Information

## How to Get Help
Before opening a new issue, please check the following:

1. **Documentation:** Review our [README](https://github.com/TenCommands/acad_grading_tools).
2. **Existing Issues:** Search the [Issues tab](https://github.com/TenCommands/acad_grading_tools/issues) to see if your question has been answered.
3. **Discussions:** For general questions, please use the [Discussions Tab](https://github.com/TenCommands/acad_grading_tools/discussions/1) or reach out to me in person.
